title.label: It is fun, but no depth

content.label: It is fun and well built, but it does not have that much depth and so the replay value suffers because of that.
Awesome gameplay, good controls, different game modes, and tons of achievements mean that you'll be playing this one for a while.
Such a simple game but a great game none the less.
The most fun you will ever have.
Whether you want to pop in for a 2 minute break or try to beat your record, this game is the perfect time waster. It's the graphics are great and the game runs smoothly. No complaints. Buy it!!
plz fix the bug.i am running 8.1.3

title.label: Favorite mobile app on any platform. Seriously. Get this.

content.label:
I have loved this game for so many years. No other mobile game comes close to taking the title away from this game. Everything about it is great. The tilting is amazingly responsive and natural to control, killing dots and getting combos are rightfully satisfying, the music is great and fits the personality of the game perfectly, which is also awesome as seen from descriptions and achievements; and it's addicting but still very fun (which most other games seem to find difficult to comprehend). Everything about the gameplay seems to be perfectly designed, from the visuals to the main goal to the hitbox of the arrow that is precise enough to encourage better dodging, and all the other mechanics that I could go on and on about. I seriously can't find a flaw in this game. I could sit and play Code Red for days. 

In short: super fun, super satisfying, WELL worth the price. Please port it to google play so this 19 year old doesn't have to borrow his mom's phone to play.
Fun, fast, short to play, but great use of the screen space and the gyroscope. You wouldn't think you could fit between those dots sometimes, but you do!
I have had this game since it came out and I find it is still the only app that I constantly go back to. Great app.
All I have to say is... ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„ AWESOME!!!!
I still like playing this one even after purchasing the second one. So much fun, this is on of the best iOS games out there.
This game is addictive and very easy to play - though impossible to beat. So much fun and very clean design. Plus I love the purple Assassin's Creed power-ups.

So I bought this app skeptically because I liked the light version, but the sequel got bad reviews. But once I hit the "new game" button, I was amazed. 4 new game modes! Classic is fun practice, code red puts me to the test (I love it the most), gauntlet helps with control and patience, and frostbite is perfect on the go! I stopped with the light version after 4 weeks, so this hard packed version has blown me away, and will never get old. Get light first just to see if you like it, but DONT get #2. If you don't get this, then you are a fudging buzzkill. Now tilt to live your life!
If there were more achievements to earn, I think there would be more to play to make it even more fun!

Tilt to live is seriously one of the most entertaining games on the App Store.The level of difficulty and enjoyment this game brings is undeniable.However,I always find myself wanting to get a refund for the viva la turret in app purchase,but it never got refunded.Instead,the screen turns blank with the background for an exorbitant amount of time.If you guys fix this,to make it easier to refund,this will be the greatest game ever.Easy to learn,difficult to master!
great game! totally addictive and very fun!
It's a fun survival game and every thing about it is cool
This is one game I always go back to after I beat other apps.  It's so much fun!!!!!

title.label: BEST GAME ON THE APP STORE!

content.label: I've had my little iPod for a long time and played many a game and this game alone is by far the best game ever, the music and graphics are beautiful, the game modes are challenging and addicting, and endless gameplay make this the best app I've ever downloaded, I was kind of skeptical about it being three dollars but now that I know what it's like, I would pay double that without a question. 6 stars all the way!
Fun and challenging.
Great game LOVE IT

I can barely survive a minute before I'm killed, but I keep on playing. It's the most addictive game out there. Even the music is great. 

Excuse me, I've got to play another round.

I go through a lot of games on my iPhone deleting and getting new ones this one I've kept forever. Awesome game. (: <3
Is it worth it? Quit joking around.
A great game and time waster some of the achievements are pretty funny.

i got bored the other day so i looked on the app store for games, found this, started playing....hooked after 5 minutes....4 hours later, still playing...sister looking at me weird...yeah.. this game is kickass!
After purchasing, a few in app advertisements continuously interrupt me between sessions. Great game, but consumerism is out of control. I paid once already. Let me play.
Tilt to Live is a really cool and adctive game. I just think that it doesnt receive the attention that it actually deserves.
Winner of the best game ever on the iPhone award. From roberto0 himself.

title.label: One of my first and favorite games!!

content.label:
I have had fun with this game since my iphone 3gs glad to see an ios update keep it up guys!!

 Great update!!
This game is great for boredom and off task foolin' around!
That's it really, it's a great time waster
I just purchased its sequel, but the original is still great!
This is the best game on IOS, I've had it for so long and it's still fun, if you don't have it then what are you waiting for!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
This I s the app that has been on my I touch the longest! Since the reviews are bad for the 2nd tilt to live, you should add to this one! Add more weapons and achievements! Thanks!
I've had it for many years and it's still the best game to play while pooping. speaking of poop, many people think the sequel to this game is pretty poopy
This is without a doubt THEE best iPhone game I've ever played. Ever. It's just too much fun, I love it.

Easy to pick up, intuitive controls, great upgrades, and a fun interface. I also really dig the humor.

My killing-time-on-the-metro game of choice.
Awesome
This app was my very first ios game when it first came out. I have played this game for a loooong time. Easily my favorite in all of the app store!
Just the best iOS game so far!

This game is awesome, i cant nor want to stop playing, i cant understand how i missed it for such a long time, but hands on its really a rare gem i mean the developers at One Man Left Studio have a lot of creativity cant wait for Redonkolous.
It is pretty addictive and fun but has some tough moments. I recommend it for experienced skill gamers.
Best game ever. No more needs to be said. I love this game
Every part of this game is amazing, I rarely leave reviews and I've had this game since it's been out. I still play and love it. I haven't even finished all the achievements yet!
The game is so simple but still so challenging that it keeps me coming back. Endless replay value, great value.
A perfect accelerometer-controlled game!
I am addicted to this game
Tilt to live is one of those games we've all had for years... And still continue to play.
As a developer I'm often referencing Tilt to Live as one of the best games on mobile.  Do yourself a favor and pick it up...then buy something to support the making of great games.

This game is a bullet hell, combo breaking, high intensity kill-fest. With its multiple game modes and immense amounts of achievement, it never gets boring when you play this game. I would suggest it to everybody.
